files.title: Overview
files.summary: The constant (`.const`) state space is a read-only memory initialized by the host. Constant memory is accessed with a `ld.const` instruction. Constant memory is restricted in size, currently limited to 64 KB which can be used to hold statically-sized constant variables. There is an additional 640...

files.title: 5.1.3.1. Banked Constant State Space (deprecated)
files.summary: Previous versions of PTX exposed constant memory as a set of eleven 64 KB banks, with explicit bank numbers required for variable declaration and during access.
